description: Try our easy to follow Cauliflower Cheese Bake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cauliflower bake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Cauliflower Cheese Bake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Separate cauliflower into large florets. Cook cauliflower in boiling, salted water for 3-4 minutes or until just tender. Drain and transfer to a greased oven-proof baking dish.

Melt butter in a medium saucepan, stir in flour and cook over a gentle heat for 2 minutes. Gradually whisk in milk and bring to the boil. Add mustard and 1 1/2 cups cheese. Stir until cheese has melted and sauce has thickened. Season with salt and pepper.
Pour sauce over cauliflower. Sprinkle with combined breadcrumbs and remaining cheese.’
